verbose_text: As TLR4 excitation, TRIF related adaptor molecule (TRAM) mediated the interaction between TIR domain and TRIF to facilitate the conformation changes of TRIF and recruitment of the downstream TNF receptor associated factor 3 (TRAF3) and TRAF6.
evidence: TRIF-related adaptor molecule (TRAM) mediated the interaction between TIR domain and TRIF to facilitate the conformation changes of TRIF and recruitment of the downstream TNF receptor-associated factor 3
